title: World’s Best Banks in Western Europe 2025
description: Building on a profitable and dynamic 2023, when high interest rates buoyed bank lending margins, most Western European banks had a strong 2024, ending the year with a spurt in net income and revenue growth. Many increased their focus on sustainable finance (with green bonds as a major growth area), ...

title: S. Korea’s debt ratio to hit 54.5%, surpassing peer average for first time
